title: Will people assume time travel was real 100 years from now when they see our digital archives from today and recognize faces that appear to be someone living in their current time? - Quora

response.answer_text: Your question assumes time travel is real. there are a number of individuals who claim that they are from the near future and have all stated that governments of the world recognize and announce time travel in the year 2028. time will tell.
There may be a few Nick Cage: Vampire type theories, but nothing serious.
